medium: Bleached and toned gelatin silver print (mounted to board)
inscribed:
Inscribed in pencil, recto below lower left corner of image:  SOLEIL – 
Signed and dated, recto below lower right corner of image:  JEAN * PIERRE SUDRE – 1976 * E.D’A – 
Blind stamp, recto below lower right corner of image
Stamped/inscribed in ink on label applied verso lower right corner:  PHOTOGRAPHIE ORIGINALE / JEAN-PIERRE SUDRE / TITRE:  SOLEIL – 1976 / E.D’A – LACOSTE –
creditlinerepro: © Estate of Jean-Pierre Sudre / Licensed by VAGA at Artists Rights Society (ARS), NY
